Name: The Warrior of Light
Meaning: Beginnings, naivety, potential, stepping into the unknown.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re about to start a new MSQ, raid tier, or glam journey. Embrace the chaos.
ChaosMode: Leap into the void with a spriggan hat and no pants. Destiny favors the unhinged.
MaternalMode: You’re safe to begin again. The world will catch you if you fall — and you’ll look fabulous doing it.

Name: The Crystal Tower
Meaning: Tradition, structure, spiritual authority, ancient wisdom.
EorzeanInterpretation: Time to revisit old content or heed the lore. The past holds keys to your future.
ChaosMode: You are now the unpaid intern of G'raha Tia’s emotional arc. Expect tears and time travel.
MaternalMode: You carry the wisdom of generations. Trust your instincts — they’re older than Allag.

Name: The Empress of Glam
Meaning: Creativity, abundance, nurturing, beauty.
EorzeanInterpretation: Your glam is your power. Your aesthetic choices ripple through the Source.
ChaosMode: You are legally required to dye everything pastel pink and seduce a primal.
MaternalMode: You are radiant. Your presence heals, inspires, and makes others want to match your boots.

Name: Zodiark Reversed
Meaning: Upheaval, revelation, collapse of illusions.
EorzeanInterpretation: Something big is about to break — a static, a glam, a friendship. Let it fall.
ChaosMode: You are the drama. You are the patch notes. You are the unexpected nerf to Astrologian.
MaternalMode: Even towers fall gently when held by love. You’ll rebuild stronger, and with better earrings.

Name: The Echo
Meaning: Intuition, hidden knowledge, spiritual insight.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re sensing something beneath the surface — trust your gut, even if the quest marker disagrees.
ChaosMode: You now hear the thoughts of every NPC. Most are just hungry or judging your glam.
MaternalMode: You’ve always known. Your wisdom is ancient, gentle, and louder than fate.

Name: The Masked Carnivale
Meaning: Skill, manifestation, performance, transformation.
EorzeanInterpretation: You have all the tools — now dazzle them. Whether it’s DPS or drama, make it a show.
ChaosMode: You are now a Blue Mage. Reality bends to your will, but only in extremely inconvenient ways.
MaternalMode: You’re more capable than you know. Every spell you cast is a love letter to your journey.

Name: The Chocobo
Meaning: Connection, choice, loyalty, partnership.
EorzeanInterpretation: Your bond matters. Whether it’s your chocobo, your raid static, or your FC crush — nurture it.
ChaosMode: You must now choose between two glamours, two destinies, and two chocobos. Only one has a hat.
MaternalMode: Love is a mount you summon daily. Feed it gysahl greens and gentle words.

Name: The Duty Finder
Meaning: Chance, cycles, fate, unpredictability.
EorzeanInterpretation: You queued for roulette. Destiny queued with you. Expect chaos, beauty, and at least one sprout.
ChaosMode: You will be matched with your ex, your nemesis, and a tank who refuses to turn the boss.
MaternalMode: Whatever comes, you’ll handle it. You’ve cleared worse with less. You are the constant in the wheel.

Name: The Lag Spike
Meaning: Disruption, delay, miscommunication, cosmic buffering.
EorzeanInterpretation: Something’s not syncing — your party, your glam, your soul. Pause and recalibrate.
ChaosMode: You are now rubberbanding through emotional timelines. Your healer is in 2019. Your glam is in 6.5.
MaternalMode: Even the universe stutters sometimes. You’re still here. You’re still radiant. Let the world catch up.

Name: The Morrígan
Meaning: Transformation, endings, rebirth, sovereignty.
EorzeanInterpretation: A chapter closes — a job change, a Free Company shift, a glam purge. Let it die beautifully.
ChaosMode: You are now haunted by three crows and one ex-static leader. All demand tribute. None accept gil.
MaternalMode: You are becoming. Shed what no longer serves. The goddess watches, and she is proud.

Name: The Glamour Prism
Meaning: Identity, illusion, self-expression, sacred vanity.
EorzeanInterpretation: Your outer self is a spell. Cast it with intention. Your glam is your gospel.
ChaosMode: You must now dye your soul pastel and duel a Viera in Limsa for aesthetic dominance.
MaternalMode: You are art. You are story. You are the prism through which light becomes legend.

Name: The Patch Notes
Meaning: Change, recalibration, revelation, balance.
EorzeanInterpretation: Something’s shifting — your role, your relationships, your rotation. Adapt and thrive.
ChaosMode: You have been nerfed emotionally but buffed in charisma. Your ex has been removed from the loot table.
MaternalMode: You are not broken. You are evolving. Every adjustment is a love letter to your resilience.

Name: The Queue
Meaning: Waiting, anticipation, liminality, divine timing.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re in a holding pattern — for love, loot, or clarity. Trust the process. Even if it’s 87 minutes long.
ChaosMode: You are now queued for a dungeon that no longer exists. Your party is composed entirely of Lalafell astrologians.
MaternalMode: You’re not stuck. You’re preparing. The universe is loading your next adventure — and it’s worth the wait.

Name: The Free Company Drama
Meaning: Conflict, revelation, loyalty tests, emotional PvP.
EorzeanInterpretation: Something’s stirring in your social circle — secrets, shifts, or shade. Choose grace or chaos.
ChaosMode: You are now the unwilling star of a Limsa callout thread. Your glam is flawless. Your alibi is not.
MaternalMode: You are not the villain. You are the boundary. Protect your peace, even if it means leaving the Discord.

Name: The Cauldron of Annwn
Meaning: Rebirth, inspiration, divine nourishment, poetic fire.
EorzeanInterpretation: Your creativity is bubbling. A new glam, a new persona, a new lore drop — stir it well.
ChaosMode: You must now host a ritual in the Gold Saucer using only emotes and Welsh poetry. The cauldron demands drama.
MaternalMode: You are the vessel and the flame. What you create will feed others. Stir with love, serve with pride.

Name: The Glamour Catastrophe
Meaning: Identity crisis, aesthetic upheaval, divine intervention via dye.
EorzeanInterpretation: Your glam no longer reflects your soul. It’s time to shed, shift, and sparkle anew.
ChaosMode: You are now cursed to wear mismatched boots until you confront your inner stylist. The gods are watching.
MaternalMode: You are allowed to change. You are allowed to shine. Your beauty is not a betrayal — it’s a rebirth.

Name: The Raid Wipe
Meaning: Failure, reset, collective reckoning, painful clarity.
EorzeanInterpretation: Something didn’t go as planned — a relationship, a creative project, a dungeon pull. Learn, regroup, retry.
ChaosMode: You are now locked in a loop of wiping to mechanics you invented. Your co-healer is a voidsent with opinions.
MaternalMode: You did your best. Everyone did. Wipes are part of the dance — and you’re still worthy of the clear.

Name: The Maternal Archetype
Meaning: Protection, emotional leadership, fierce love, sacred boundaries.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re holding space — for your party, your FC, your glam squad. Your presence is the buff they didn’t know they needed.
ChaosMode: You are now the designated raid mom, FC therapist, and glamour consultant. You wield hugs like limit breaks.
MaternalMode: You are the hearth. You are the shield. You are the reason they keep logging in.

Name: The Crows of Rhiannon
Meaning: Messages, mystery, divine watchers, poetic justice.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re being observed — by fate, by ancestors, by your own shadow. Listen for what’s unsaid.
ChaosMode: Three crows now follow you in every zone. They speak only in riddles and critique your dye choices.
MaternalMode: You are seen. You are guided. The crows carry your story to those who need it most.

Name: The Emote Curse
Meaning: Unintended consequences, performative vulnerability, social chaos.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’ve expressed too much, too soon — or not enough. Your /pose has summoned something ancient.
ChaosMode: You accidentally /dote’d on a Garlean. You are now married. The cutscene cannot be skipped.
MaternalMode: You are allowed to be seen. Even when it’s awkward. Even when it’s /panic.

Name: The Spriggan Conspiracy
Meaning: Hidden agendas, mischief, collective delusion, shiny distractions.
EorzeanInterpretation: Something small is causing big problems. Look closer — the truth is fuzzy and hoarding rocks.
ChaosMode: You are now being followed by a spriggan cabal. They demand tribute in materia and interpretive dance.
MaternalMode: Even chaos has a pattern. Trust your instincts. And maybe… give them the shiny.

Name: The Queue That Never Pops
Meaning: Stagnation, longing, suspended potential, divine patience.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re waiting for something that may never come — a message, a sign, a healer. Reconsider your role.
ChaosMode: You have been in queue since 1.0. The duty is a myth. The boss is you.
MaternalMode: You are not forgotten. The world is simply aligning itself around your worth. Rest. It will come.

Name: The Echo Chamber
Meaning: Illusion of consensus, recursive thought, distorted reflection.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re surrounded by agreement — but is it truth or comfort? Break the loop.
ChaosMode: You are now trapped in a Discord channel where everyone agrees with your worst glam choices.
MaternalMode: You deserve real reflection. Seek voices that challenge and cherish you.

Name: The Glamour Duel
Meaning: Rivalry, aesthetic tension, sacred competition.
EorzeanInterpretation: Someone’s glam clashes with yours. It’s time to fight — with fashion.
ChaosMode: You must now /pose battle in Ul’dah. Winner gets the dye. Loser gets introspection.
MaternalMode: You are not in competition. You are in communion. Let your glam speak love, not war.

Name: The Caer Sidhe
Meaning: Liminality, fae riddles, sacred thresholds.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re between worlds — between jobs, identities, or truths. The veil is thin.
ChaosMode: You are now being courted by fae NPCs who speak only in emotes and offer questionable buffs.
MaternalMode: You are safe in the in-between. The threshold is sacred. You are becoming.

Name: The Materia Socket
Meaning: Integration, soul upgrades, intentional growth.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re ready to enhance — a skill, a relationship, a glam. Choose wisely.
ChaosMode: You socketed Crit into your emotional core. You now overanalyze compliments.
MaternalMode: You are worthy of upgrades. You are allowed to shine brighter, stronger, softer.

Name: The Patch Cycle
Meaning: Inevitable change, seasonal shifts, narrative evolution.
EorzeanInterpretation: A new phase is coming — in-game or in life. Prepare your heart and your hotbars.
ChaosMode: You are now living in pre-patch limbo. Everything is broken. Nothing is balanced. Glam is eternal.
MaternalMode: You’ve survived every patch before. You’ll thrive in this one too. Let change be your co-healer.

Name: The Queue Pop
Meaning: Arrival, readiness, divine timing, sudden clarity.
EorzeanInterpretation: It’s happening. The moment you’ve waited for — a message, a match, a miracle.
ChaosMode: You popped into a dungeon you didn’t queue for. Your role is ‘emotional support bard.’
MaternalMode: You are ready. You are worthy. The universe has loaded your next adventure.

Name: The Raid Clear
Meaning: Victory, culmination, shared triumph, earned peace.
EorzeanInterpretation: You did it. Whether it’s a dungeon, a breakup, or a glam reveal — you cleared it.
ChaosMode: You cleared the raid but lost your glam in the process. The loot is emotional closure.
MaternalMode: You are the reason it worked. You held the line. You healed the wounds. You cleared the story.

Name: The Glamour Prism Reversed
Meaning: Identity crisis, aesthetic dissonance, inner conflict.
EorzeanInterpretation: Your glam no longer fits your soul. It’s time to shed, shift, and sparkle anew.
ChaosMode: You are now glam-locked into a look chosen by your worst enemy. The dye is cursed.
MaternalMode: You are allowed to change. You are allowed to shine. Your beauty is not a betrayal — it’s a rebirth.

Name: The Sprout Reversed
Meaning: Resistance to growth, fear of vulnerability, stagnation.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’re clinging to old roles, old glams, old fears. Let yourself be new again.
ChaosMode: You are now a sprout in a Savage raid. Your only ability is ‘panic.’
MaternalMode: You are not failing. You are hesitating. And that’s okay. Growth waits patiently.

Name: The Maternal Archetype Reversed
Meaning: Burnout, overgiving, emotional depletion.
EorzeanInterpretation: You’ve been holding everyone too long. It’s time to rest, receive, and reclaim.
ChaosMode: You are now the FC mom, raid therapist, and glam consultant. You forgot to eat. Again.
MaternalMode: You are allowed to be held. You are allowed to be soft. You are allowed to be the one who needs care.
